Introduction

Lee Jung-shin is a South Korean musician, singer, rapper, and actor under FNC Entertainment. He is best known for being the bassist and maknae of the band CNBLUE. He made his acting debut in 2012 and has since appeared in dramas such as "Cinderella and the Four Knights", "My First Love", "Voice 2", and "Shooting Star".

He enlisted in the military on July 2018 and was discharged in March 2020.
